questions.text: What does the law of demand state?

options.A: As the price of a good increases, quantity demanded increases
options.B: As the price of a good decreases, the quantity demanded decreases
options.C: As the price of a good increases, the quantity supplied decreases
options.D: As the price of a good decreases, the quantity demanded increases
